basic.Peptide Name: rCRAMP (rat cathelin-related antimicrobial peptide; Rodents, mammals, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [No NaCl]:Escherichia coli DH5a (MIC=0.54 µM), E. coli ML-35p (MIC=1.55 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC=0.69 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa MR3007 (MIC=2.01 µM); Staphylococcus aureus ATCC (MRSA) 33591 (MIC=3.19 µM), Staphylococcus aureus 93918 (MIC=2.14 µM).[100 mM NaCl]:Escherichia coli DH5a (MIC=0.61 µM), Escherichia coli ML-35p (MIC=0.66 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC=1.17 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa MR3007 (MIC=1.78 µM), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC (MRSA) 33591 (MIC>20.1 µM), Staphylococcus aureus 93918 (MIC=2.16 µM).
